sources.title: 1938 Frauen Für Golden Hill ( Viktor Staal, Grethe Weiser, Ernst Waldow, Otto Gebühr, Hans Adalbert Von Schlettow, Paul Dahlke)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1938 Frauen für Golden Hill.  U.a mit Viktor Staal und Grethe Weiser

metadata.Plot: The all-male inhabitants of an Australian mining camp send off for some mail order brides from Sydney. Two men refuse to join in, but their friend secretly arranges for two wives for them. Unfortunately one of them proves to be his own abandoned wife, who takes up with him again. This means a love triangle develops between the two men around the remaining woman.
metadata.Writer: Hans Bertram, Georg Hurdalek, Wolf Neumeister
metadata.Actors: Kirsten Heiberg, Viktor Staal, Elfie Mayerhofer
